</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if [[vehicle]] is locked. If it is locked, [[Object#Person|Persons]] cannot mount / dismount without order. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[locked]] vehicle </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>
* [[Number]] - since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part></template>
** 0: Unlocked
** 1: Default - a subordinate player cannot enter without AI leader order
** 2: Locked
** 3: Locked for player
** -1: vehicle [[isNull|is null]]
* [[Boolean]] for older games </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_locked = [[locked]] _jeepOne;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lock]], [[setVehicleLock]], [[lockedDriver]], [[lockedCargo]], [[lockedTurret]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
